channel.title: Comments on: Export HTML table to Excel with grid lines

item.title: By: Tom

item.description: It looks complicated, but I'll try it once. Along with this video of this site, I will certainly succeed it certainly. http://www.excel-aid.com/excel-gridlines-printing-gridlines-column-and-row-headers.html

item.description: Great Post, how do you create another worksheet and add another html table to it?

item.title: By: kris
item.dc:creator: kris
item.description: Hi I generate html code from source code and i want to export it in an excel file, any suggestions?
